languages.text: "Если ты подозреваешь тассерианцев в чем-то, почему до сих пор бездействовал?"

traits.locale_text: "Если ты подозреваешь тессерианцев в преступной деятельности, почему до сих пор бездействовал?"

languages.text: "If you have suspicions about the Thasserians, why have you not taken any action so far?"
languages.original_text: "Если ты подозреваешь тассерианцев в чем-то, почему до сих пор бездействовал?"

traits.locale_text: "If you have suspicions about the Thasserians, why have you not taken any action so far?"
"If you have suspicions about the Thasserians, why have you not taken any action so far?"
"If you have suspicions about the Thasserians, why have you not taken any action so far?"
"If you have suspicions about the Thasserians, why have you not taken any action so far?"
"If you have suspicions about the Thasserians, why have you not taken any action so far?"
"If you have suspicions about the Thasserians, why have you not taken any action so far?"

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr den Thasserianern gegenüber misstrauisch seid, warum habt Ihr bisher nichts unternommen?"
languages.original_text: "If you have suspicions about the Thasserians, why have you not taken any action so far?"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr den Thasserianern gegenüber misstrauisch seid, warum habt Ihr bisher nichts unternommen?"

languages.text: « Si vous soupçonnez les Thasseriens de manigancer quelque chose, pourquoi n'avoir pris aucune mesure pour y remédier ? »
languages.original_text: "If you have suspicions about the Thasserians, why have you not taken any action so far?"

traits.locale_text: « Si vous soupçonnez les Thasseriens de manigancer quelque chose, pourquoi n'avoir pris aucune mesure pour y remédier ? »

languages.text: 「タッセーラ人を疑っているのなら、なぜこれまで何の行動も起こしてこなかったんだ？」
languages.original_text: "If you have suspicions about the Thasserians, why have you not taken any action so far?"

traits.locale_text: 「タッセーラ人を疑っているのなら、なぜこれまで何の行動も起こしてこなかったんだ？」

languages.text: «Si tiene sospechas sobre los thasserianos, ¿por qué no ha actuado aún?».
languages.original_text: "If you have suspicions about the Thasserians, why have you not taken any action so far?"

traits.locale_text: «Si tiene sospechas sobre los thasserianos, ¿por qué no ha actuado aún?».

languages.text: “既然你怀疑那些塔瑟拉人，那为什么你到目前为止，没有采取任何行动？”
languages.original_text: "If you have suspicions about the Thasserians, why have you not taken any action so far?"

traits.locale_text: “既然你怀疑那些塔瑟拉人，那为什么你到目前为止，没有采取任何行动？”

languages.text: "Thasseralılara dair şüphelerin varsa neden şu ana kadar herhangi bir önlem almadın?"
languages.original_text: "If you have suspicions about the Thasserians, why have you not taken any action so far?"

traits.locale_text: "Thasseralılara dair şüphelerin varsa neden şu ana kadar herhangi bir önlem almadın?"
